featureDescription: The AnimatedOnHover component applies animated effects (like pulse, spin, wiggle, etc.) to elements inside an SVG when hovered. Only elements with the class 'animate' will respond.

params.description: (type: React.ReactElement), Required â€” the SVG element or group to animate
(type: number), Width of the container SVG (default: 300)
(type: number), Height of the container SVG (default: 300)
(type: string), Animation style to apply on hover. Options: 'pulse', 'spin', 'wiggle', 'tilt', 'jelly', 'pop' (default: 'pulse')

svg-requirement.explanation: Only SVG elements with the class name 'animate' will respond to hover animations.

classes.name: animate
classes.description: Marks the SVG elements that will animate on hover.

svg-requirement.example:
<svg width="100" height="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <circle class="animate" cx="50" cy="50" r="30" fill="blue" />
</svg>

examples.title: Animations (Click to cycle through)
examples.code:
{/* Example code where animation type is set to 'jelly' */}
 <AnimatedOnHover src={<Example/>} width={200} animation={"jelly"}/>
